CocoaHeads Brisbane

A monthly Mac & iOS developer meetup
meetup.com/cocoaheads

@cocoaheadsbne
github.com/cocoaheadsbne

Contact our organisers:

Ben Stovold: @followben
Matt Connolly: @matt_connolly

Microsoft Azure Mobile Web Services

04 Dec 2013

This month Lachlan Hardy from Microsoft will give us an overview of Windows Azure Mobile Services incl. how to create an iOS app using Azure as a cloud-based backend. If there's time, Ben will also do a presentation on using iOS 7's new view controller transitioning APIs.

For those of you who haven't been to River City Labs. Take the lift to the second floor. If no one is waiting at the door, call Ben (0434 909 033) or Matt (0419 743 141)

Thanks to our sponsors Microsoft and River City Labs, food and drinks are provided, so come along and join the fun!

Sponsors

  • Microsoft Azure Web Services

There's limited places available, so please remember to RSVP.
